casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Frank Leo VUCI and Henry Anthony Noto, Defendants-Appellants. No. 71-2229. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 30, 1971. Rehearing Denied Dec. 27, 1971. Bryan E. Bush, Jr., Sam J. D’Amico, Baton Rouge, La., for defendants-appellants. Gerald J. Gallinghouse, U. S. Atty., K. Eric Gisleson, Atty., Dept, of Justice, New Orleans, La., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG and DYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 (5th Cir. 1970).
